participant_1.background:
I like to read diabetes blogs to learn about new ways to control my condition.
I enjoy the creative process of designing and sewing my own clothes.
My parents are proud of my photography.
I'm interested in learning about new driving techniques to improve my racing.
i have beard that is longer.

participant_2.background:
My biggest animal sighting was a great white shark swimming beside our boat off the coast of South Africa.
i am a vet tech.
i have trouble getting motivated.
Photography is my passion, but I could never do it if I were blind because it requires a keen sense of sight to capture the perfect shot.
i ve been married for five years.

content.text: Hello! What do you do for work?
I am a vet tech and I love it!
I am a photographer and my parents are proud of me for that.
Oh that is cool! I love animals and I am always getting inspiration from them for my photography.
That is awesome! What's your favorite animal?
I think I would have to say the great white shark. I saw one swimming beside our boat off the coast of South Africa a few years ago and it was amazing!
That sounds like an amazing experience! I have heard that they are beautiful creatures.
They are! I also like that they are so powerful and mysterious.
I can definitely understand that. What kind of photography do you like to do?
I like to do a lot of different things, but my favorite is probably wildlife photography.
That's awesome! I would love to see some of your work sometime.
I would be happy to show you! I have a portfolio online that you can check out.
Great! I will check it out when I get a chance.
